title: Lugard voyage to the Niger MCQ 1

content.question: The rival British and French claims over the Niger River region in the 1890s were most directly a part of which of the following processes?

choices.label: The British efforts to safeguard the routes to India, Great Britain’s most important colony
The response of established colonial powers to the ambitions of new imperial states such as Germany and Italy
The European “scramble” to acquire territories in Africa through both peaceful and military means
The shift from “imperialism by company” to direct imperial rule in many European colonies

content.answer: The European “scramble” to acquire territories in Africa through both peaceful and military means

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
